import os
import dotenv
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dotenv.load_dotenv()

wingback.db.queries.connect('postgresql://{user}:{password}@{host}:{port}/{database}'.format(
    host=os.environ['DB_HOST'],
    user=os.environ['DB_USER'],
    password=os.environ['DB_PASS'],
    database=os.environ['DB_NAME'],
    port=os.environ['DB_PORT'],
))
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ModelABC[source]

ModelABC()

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Benchmark[source]

Benchmark(time_window=360) :: ModelABC

A benchmark model that gives the same predictions for every match.

This prediction is simply an average of the observed scoreline frequency within the training data.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
benchmark_model = Benchmark(time_window=730)
target_date = dt.datetime(2020, 3, 1).date()

train = benchmark_model.fetch_data(
    league_ids=[1],
    date=target_date
)
benchmark_model.fit(train)

test = list(wingback.db.queries.fetch_matches(
    start=target_date,
    end=target_date+dt.timedelta(days=1), 
    league_ids=[1],
    season_ids=[None]
))

predictions = benchmark_model.predict(test)

print(f'Home team: {test[0]["home_team"]}')
print(f'Away team: {test[0]["away_team"]}')
for outcome, prediction in mezzala.scorelines_to_outcomes(predictions[0]).items():
    print(f'{outcome.value.ljust(9)}: {prediction.probability:0.2f}')

Home team: Everton
Away team: Manchester United
Home win : 0.46
Draw     : 0.21
Away win : 0.32
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class DCGoals[source]

DCGoals(time_window=360, epsilon=-0.0065, params=None) :: ModelABC

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dc_model = DCGoals()

train = dc_model.fetch_data(
    league_ids=[1],
    date=target_date
)

dc_model.fit(train)

predictions = dc_model.predict(test)

test_ix = 1
print(f'Home team: {test[test_ix]["home_team"]}')
print(f'Away team: {test[test_ix]["away_team"]}')
for outcome, prediction in mezzala.scorelines_to_outcomes(predictions[test_ix]).items():
    print(f'{outcome.value.ljust(9)}: {prediction.probability:0.2f}')

Home team: Tottenham
Away team: Wolverhampton Wanderers
Home win : 0.42
Draw     : 0.26
Away win : 0.32
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class DCxG[source]

DCxG(min_probability=0.1, time_window=360, epsilon=-0.0065) :: ModelABC

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
xg_model = DCxG(time_window=360, epsilon=0)  # No time weighting

train = xg_model.fetch_data(
    league_ids=[1],
    date=target_date
)
xg_model.fit(train)

predictions = xg_model.predict(test)

test_ix = 1
print(f'Home team: {test[test_ix]["home_team"]}')
print(f'Away team: {test[test_ix]["away_team"]}')
for outcome, prediction in mezzala.scorelines_to_outcomes(predictions[test_ix]).items():
    print(f'{outcome.value.ljust(9)}: {prediction.probability:0.2f}')

Home team: Tottenham
Away team: Wolverhampton Wanderers
Home win : 0.26
Draw     : 0.33
Away win : 0.41
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
xg_model = DCxG(time_window=360, epsilon=-0.01)  # Incredibly aggressive time-weighting

train = xg_model.fetch_data(
    league_ids=[1],
    date=target_date
)
xg_model.fit(train)

predictions = xg_model.predict(test)

test_ix = 1
print(f'Home team: {test[test_ix]["home_team"]}')
print(f'Away team: {test[test_ix]["away_team"]}')
for outcome, prediction in mezzala.scorelines_to_outcomes(predictions[test_ix]).items():
    print(f'{outcome.value.ljust(9)}: {prediction.probability:0.2f}')

Home team: Tottenham
Away team: Wolverhampton Wanderers
Home win : 0.19
Draw     : 0.31
Away win : 0.50
